Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies
full_summary:
# Supply of Microplate Reader
## Request for Proposal

The Department of Health Canada is inviting pre-qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI to submit bids for the supply of one (1) microplate reader.

### Notice Details

* **Title**: Supply of Microplate Reader
* **Reference Number**: 1000252321A
* **Contracting Officer**: Eryn Mathers (P: 613-298-2804, E: [eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca))
* **Notice Status**: Expired
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Trade Agreement

This requirement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Tendering Procedures

Suppliers must be pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies. Suppliers can qualify for this arrangement at any time by downloading the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from [AchatsCanada (SAP Ariba)](http://www-buyandsell.gc.ca).

### Mandatory Technical Criteria

 Suppliers must meet the technical requirements outlined in the solicitation document. 

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The Contracting Officer will evaluate the tenders based on the lowest aggregate price.

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is September 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM.

### Supplemental Information

The solicitation documents can be downloaded from [AchatsCanada (SAP Ariba)](http://www-buyandsell.gc.ca). Suppliers are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the solicitation documents.

Please note that this request is exclusive to holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment,Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.  

Bidders are invited to submit their proposals electronically through Buyandsell.gc.ca. Exceptions to this are noted in the solicitation documents. Exceptions to this are noted in the solicitation documents.

### Closing Note

Health Canada reserves the right to modify or cancel this requirement at any time without notice.

Only responsive bidders who meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be considered for contract award. Please note that any liability resulting from missed deadline or bids received after the specified closing time will not be considered.
